title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish in the JAR packager wizard, it shows the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: After pressing finish in the JAR packager wizard, it displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: I expected to be able to create a JAR with unsaved editors. However, in the current behavior, I have to quit the wizard, save the unsaved editors, open the wizard again, and then enter all the fields again in order to create the JAR.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the JAR packager wizard. 2. Have some unsaved editors. 3. Fill in all the fields in the wizard. 4. Click on the 'Finish' button.
